    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>

    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>ILMoE</catalog>
            <entry>ILMoE2073</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Earth Science Education:An extra dimension to science education in schools</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Extramaß der Geowissenschaft Education:An zur 
Wissenschaft Ausbildung in den Schulen</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Dimension supplémentaire de la science de la 
terre Education:An à l'éducation de la science dans les écoles</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Dimensão extra da ciência de terra Education:An
à instrução da ciência nas escolas</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Dimensione supplementare di scienze della terra 
Education:An a formazione di scienza in scuole</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Πρόσθετη διάσταση γήινης επιστήμης Education:An 
στην εκπαίδευση επιστήμης στα σχολεία</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Dimensión adicional de la geología Education:An
a la educación de la ciencia en escuelas</string>
          </title>
          <language>en</language>
          <description>
            <string language="en">THe paper discusses the lack of geoscience and the importance of including it in school curricula.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">geoscience</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">curriculum</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">society</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Das Papier behandelt den Mangel an geoscience und
den Wert des Einschließens er in den Schulelehrplänen.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Le papier discute le manque de geoscience et 
l'importance de l'inclure dans des programmes d'études d'école.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">O papel discute a falta do geoscience e a 
importância de inclui-la em curricula da escola.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">La carta discute la mancanza di geoscience e 
l'importanza di includerla nei programmi di studi della scuola.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">THe το έγγραφο συζητά την έλλειψη geoscience και
τη σημασία το στα σχολικά προγράμματα σπουδών.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">El papel discute la carencia del geoscience y la 
importancia de incluirla en planes de estudios de la escuela.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">geoscience</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>
